The said day Dauid steuart present ane barrel merkit and signet with the
merk of ane Reuerend' fadir in god eduard bischop of orknay and ane firlot
and ane Pek merkit with the signe and mesour of edinburgh qu be the quhilk
barrell archbald' Dawling duelland' in the quenys ferry awenar'
and skipper of ane schip callit the gailyeart and furit the beir out
of orknay fra the said reuerend fadir and deliuerit to Androw strang of
pettarchy extendng to xxxxx and tuelf barrellis met with the said
barrell quhilk contenit thre firlotis and ane quarter of ane pek
of the just mesour of Edinburgh' met befor the bailyeis of the said
burgh' in Jugment

The said' day Androw gordone Donald baxtar do gilbert tulidef
Sandy Donaldsone and thomas Srathloche was accusit for
brekin of common ordinance that thai furnist nocht the tone
with brede of quhet Ande for conspiracioun' makand bande
and lande lege ymang thame Agane the tone that thai wald bak nay
bred' of the pace gevin to thame be toune quhilk thai denyit
Ande in continent thareftir it was put to the decisione of thir personis
chosin in Ane assis' that is to say Johne of Cullane Dauid andirsone
mathou branche Johne andirsone William Wormet William murray
gavane murray William rolland' Dauid fynne henry red Androw brabnir
Androw lousone Johne arthouris' Robert morys' Adam Weir' Robert hile
Cuthtbert Johnestone Dauid Adamsone Johne Watsone Wylliam bole and
Richard litstar quhilkis riplie auisit fand' and deliuerit ale in ane voce
concordand' that thai coud' nocht acquit the said' baxtaris for brekin
of common ordinance for the quhilkis Ilkan of thame was in amerciament of

balliuorum burgi de abirdene in pretorio eiusdem protribunali sedenti decimo quinto die menis octobris

portar Dauid Steuart Dauid Kintor Dauid fynne Duncanum colisone Johannem blak matheum

Andream lousone gavinum murray Dauid arrot burgenses dicti burgi Quj Jurati dicunt

The said day the actioun' of tribulance betuix Johnne colisone and alexander
menyeis one that ane part and Johnne arthoure one that ane vthir part at
the request of patry leslie bailye and the gud men of the tovne present for
the tyme maid to baitht the said partijs and at the requeist maid be the said
Johnne and alexander menyeis to the persone of Kincardin was continevit
to this day fiftene dais to the hamcumin of the Prouost and the gud men'
of the tovne in siclik strintht forme and' effect as it dois now

The said day Wilyeame portar Come souerte and law borght be his
hand land' and gudis that Johnne arthour salbe skaithles of Johnne' coli
soun' and ale that he may let ale wais bot as the cours' of commone
law wile And malcum crag come souerte and law borght be his hand
landis and gudis that the said Johnne colisoun' salbe skaithles of the said
Johnne arthoure and ale that he may let all wais bot as law will
And ilkane of the said partijs ar oblist be thar handis landis and gudis
to frietht thar said borrowis and keip thame skathles tharanent as efferis
Mathoue branche come souerte and law borght be his hand land
and gudis that Johnne arthour salbe skaithles of alexander menyeis ale
wais bot as the cours' of common will And androu stratoun' come
souerte and law borgh' be his hand land and gudis that the said alexander
menyeis salbe skaithles of the said Johnne arthour and ale that he may let
all wais bot as the cours' of common law wile And ilkane of the
said partijs as oblist be thar hand landis and gudis to freitht thar said
borrowis and keip thame skaithles tharanent as efferis
Alexander menyeis blinseile come souerte be his hand land and gudis that
Johnne arthour salbe skaithles of thomas menyeis and ale that he may latt all wais bot as
the cours' of common law will And Dauid Kintor come souerte and law
borgh' be his hand land and gudis that the said thomas menyeis salbe
skaithles of the said Johnne arthour his partie adherand' and ale that he
may let ale wais bot as the cours' of common law will And ilkane
of the said partijs ar oblist to freitht and releif thar said borrowis and
keip thame skaithles tharanent as efferis

The said day Johnne malisone younger grantit him awand to Robert
hill xiij s' vj quhilkis the bailyeis chargit him to pay within terme of
law quhilk Some the said robert hill assignit and gef to thomas
craufurd to be deliuerit to him or his factouris in his name

Eodem die Johannes murray fecit constituit creauit et nominauit gavi
num murray et Johannem Kintor coniunctim et diuisim suos legttimos procura
tores ad prosequendum Johannem Kennerty pro complemento contractus inter ipsos
initi de et super empcione cuiusdem terre Promittens se Ratum et
gratum cum ceteris clausulis necessariis et oportunis

Eodem die Jacobus nauiam magister Nauis le pillican vocatam fecit con
stituit creauit et nominauit alexandrum malisoun' suum verum legittimum
et Indubitatum procuratorium

et alexandro menyeis tribus balliuorum burgi de Aberdene In pretorio eiusdem
in curia balliuorum protribunali sedenti decimoquinto die mensis octobris Anno Dominj
millesimo quingentesimo Nono per subscriptum videlicet Johannem ruthirfurd militem
thomam Waus Willelmum portar Dauid steuart Dauid Kintor Dauid fynne
Duncanum colisone Johannem blak matheum branche malcomum crag Karo
lum stevinsone andream stratoun' alexandrum malisoun' henricum red andream
lousone gavinum murray et Dauid Arrot burgensis dictj burgj Quj
Jurati dicunt quod Johannes Raburne patruus Roberti Raburne est pro
pinquior agnatus id est consanguineus ex parte patris dicto Roberto
filio et heredi quondam Willelmi raburne patris suj burgensis ditci burgj Et
dictus Johannes Raburne excessit etatem vigintj quinque Annorum
Et est suj rei prouidus et potens cantre ydonee de administracione

se ipsum contigerit in decidere quia dictus robertus habet vnum fratrem et

et matre datum et clausum sub Sigillo debet patricij leslie ballivi ac sigillis quorundam

tatis

decimosexto die mensis octobris Anno quosupra

The said day Wilyeame boll skipper grantit him awand to Johnne
of cullan' xxj schillingis for keile fraucht for the quhilkis he fand
thomas craufurd souerte to pay to the said Johnne or the barg salit
of this townne

The said day Duncane fif come souerte be his hand and gudis to
Johnne Colisoun' bailye to entir Adam fif his brodir within xxiiij houris
warnyng eftir the cumin hame of the prouost fra the montht be the rectour
of the vniuersite or the maistris of the samyn withtin the colleg of the saide'
vniversite befor the said rector and prouost for the offence and tribulance
done to Robert cowtis student and supposit in the said vniversite

The said day henry farchar was conuict' be ane suorne assis' Johnne
of cullan' forspekar for the tribulance of adam fif and the said Adam
for the licht tribulance of the said henry for the quhilkis ilkane of thaim
was in amerciament of the court sic as thai aucht to tynt of law and tile
ament as law wil and forbeir in tym tocum and that was gevin for dome

The said day Rankyn' nicholsone was conuict' be the said assis' for the tri
bulance of the said Adam for the quhilkis he was in amerciament of the court and tile
amend as law will and forber in tyme tocum / and Atour it was deliuerit
and ordanit be the said assis' that for the offens done to the tovne the said
henry and Rankin ilkane of thame to pay tua pund' of wax to the haly blud
licht And gif thai commyt ony tribulance within this burgh' in tyme tocum
to the said adam or ony vthiris and beis conuict' tharof to pay x li' to sanct
nicholas werk vnforgevin

The said day patry reid come souerte and law borgh' be his hand and
gudis that adam fif salbe skaithles of henry farchar all wais bot
as the cours' of common law will And Duncan fif come souerte be his
hand and gudis that the said henry salbe skaithles of the said adam all
wais bot as law wile And ilkane of the said partijs ar oblist till
freitht and releif thar said souerteis skaithles of the said law borowis
as efferis

Curia balliuorum burgi de Abirdene Tenta in pretorio eiusdem xixo die mensis Octobris
Anno Domini millesimo quingentesimo nono

The said day Patrik reid Alexander malisone gilbert litster and Dauid tailyour
suorn' ande chsoin be Androw low one that ane part ande Richerd litster one that vthir part with the
consent of the bailyeis to considir the skaith done tile ane' pece of blew clath in the
litting deliuerit and ordanit the said' Richard' to pay sex schillingis to the said Androw
in recompens' for the skaith done to the said' claith in the lating

The said' day Johnne Weillame grantit him to pay Richard' barnis the valour of
and blancat ane sek and ane' bridile safer as the said' Richerd' ande his wif wile
mak faith thai var worth

The saide daye Androw segat grantit his wif tile haue resauit fra Androw
Cullane xiij bollis of beyr And haide deliuerit to the said' androw thre bollis
tharof Ande half and' bol tile Alexander penny

Octobris Anno Dominj millesimo quingentesimo nono

The said' day Comperit Williame leslie and fand' ane' borgh in the handis of
Williame scrimgeour ane' of the officiaris of the said' burgh' that he aw tile arrest
the gudis of Airschip pertenand' tile wmquhile thomas leslie his brodir that nane'
Intromet tharwith bot be kepit tile him as neirast Ayr to the said' thomas as he
allegijt Protestand' that give ony man Intromet thairwith for remed' of law And'
patry leslie bailye chargit the said' Williame tile Arest the said' gudis

The said' dai It vas deliuerit be ane' suorn' assis' Johnne Kintor forspekar
that Thomas lammyntoun' sale deliuer content and pay til Androw criste in tortestoun
xij s' for ane' kell quhill the bailye chargit him to pay within terme of
law And the said' Androw maid constitut and ordanit gavine murray his lauchfule
and vndowtit procuratour tile resaue ande wptak the said' sowm' of xij s' fra the
said' thomas acquietancis tharof to give To do follow and defend' gif neid beis
in the sikkerrast stile of procuratory . Promittand' tile hald' ferme and stabile
et cetera with ale and sindry vthir clausulis necessair and oportune

The said day canny gvthra and Jonet strathachin the wif of Johnne fynne
was conuict' be ane suorne assis mathou branche forspekar for the spilling
of the markat and regrating in bying of meile and selling of it agane
derrar thane thai bocht it and atour ordanit the said personis to be
expellit the markat for yeir and day

The said day bessy layng the wif of Johnne berryhill was conuict' be
ane suorne assis' mathou branche forspekar for dissobeing of Johnne
cuk officiar in the exexucioun' of youre his office And for the takin
away of the set of the aile of his dur set be the said Johnne cuk
officiar' and putting vp and skorand' viij d' aile

The said day It was sufficientlie preuit be diuers' suorne famous men
that the hous tane be malcum naughtie fra the relict' of vmquhile Johnne
litstar in the grene was Ruinos' and the cowplis' tharof brokin and abill
to fall to the erd and was s nocht sufficient Tharfor the bailyeis dischargit
the said malcum of the said hous and of the tennendry of the samyn'

The said day Richerd litster eldar Johnne litstar eldar gilbert litster chosin
and suorne betuix allane litstar one tha tane part And Androw low on'
that vthir part to consider tua barrel of as' gif thai be merchand gud et cetera
Deliuerit be the moutht of the said Richerd' litster was marchand'
gud bot thai wald' mak nay werk thame allan' bot thai wald'
mak werk with vthir as'

The said day the actioun' of xl s' clamit be Robert crag vppoun'
thomas straloche was continewit to friday that nixt cummys with consent
of baitht the partijs

The said day the bailyeis and Counsaile present for the tyme ordanit all
the tennentis and Inhabitantis of thar landis to pay to Wilyeamne make
son' tenend of thar Justice myllis xij d' of euiry pleucht of thar feld'
landis to the hamcumin of the prouost quhile he and the counsaile be forthir
auisit

The saide day It was sufficiently previt befor Johnne Colisone ane' of the bailyeis of the
saide burgh' sittand' in Jugement that Robert murray haid set to Robert piper ane' croft
callit the calsay croft payande thairfor tene bollis of beir yeirly Allanerly

The said' day Robert murray grantit him awand' tile haue set tile Williame murray
ane' Ryg cal lyand' at the heddownis hile for ale the termes of five yeiris .
Curia balliuorum burgi de abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem xxiiij die Octobris anno quo supra

The said' day patrik leslie In the nayme of the merchand' mene of the toune
exponit and schewe how thar' merchande schippis Redy to saile with thar merchande
gudis was ourbodeit with gudis one the ourloft tharfor he protestit quhat skath that
happinnis to cum one the said' gudis suld' turne one tham Self ffor thai wald' nocht
lott with thame an thai happin' ony skath

The said' day Williame bole skippar' opinlie declarit he wald' beir' nay charge
one the gudis and merchandice liand' aleuf the ourloft of his schip and chargit the
personis that aw that gudis sende or Cum and bring thame one land' protestand'
quhat skath that happinnis to Cum one thame turne him to nay preiudice

The said' day the balyeis ande counsale present for the tyme ordanit and commandit
the denys of the gilde

anno quo supra

The said' day Dauid bannerman grantit him aving to Dauid mar' yongar ane barrele
of tar' to be pait at yule next hereftir follouing

The saide day the balyeis assignit this day xv dais to patry Rede tile ansuer
to the borghe fundin one him be Jonhne Kennertj for the wranguis' haldin fra
him of half ane barrele of girls' et cetera

Eodem die Johannes meldrum conuictus fuit per assiam ex orie Andrees fyf prelocutoris assise
pro perturbio Walteri Sanclar' et Idem Walterus pro perturbio ipsius Johannis in verbo
et cetera quod emendatum fuit per Curiam et assisam

The said' day Williame Rollande grantit him avand to Robert hile xij s' d'
for ane croice boll quhilkis the balyeis chargit him to pay within terme of law
Ande Jonhne meldrum grantit him to releif the said William of the said' xij s' vj d'
within terme of law Ande the said partiis oblist thame be thar handis to stand at the
ordinance of Jonhne andirsone and charllis Stewinsone anent the compt' and rek
ning

The saide day Marione Anthone was conuict' be ane suorne assis' Androw fyf forpekar
tribulance of Katherine cristiane Wricht in deid' Ande the said' cristiane for tribulance of the said'
Marione in word for the quhilkis Ilkane of thame was in Amerciament of the court

The saide day It was deliuerit and ordanit be the ballies and consale that thomas lammytone
aw to pay the xij s' aving tile Androw cristj within thre tidis becaus' he Is ane dusty
futit mane and ordanit the officiaris to pas' and distrenye the said thomas for the saide xij
s'
Curia balliouorum burgi de Abirdene tenta in pretorio eisudem vicesimo nono Anno quo supra

The saide day comperit Jonhne Colisone and Alexander menyeis and exponit to the balyeis how
the actioun' debatabile of tribulance betuix thame and Jonhne arthour' was continevit
to this day to the hamecumyne of the aldirman et cetera quharfor thai offerit thame
redy tile ansuer to the saide Jonhne arthour in ale thingis he hed' tile obiect or
say to thame And' tile vndirlie the law tharintile Ande becaus' the saide Johne was
lauchfullie callit and nocht comperit the ballieis continevit the saide Actioun' to this
day x aucht dais in siclik strintht force and effect as obefor

Curia balliuorum burgi de abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem penultimo die mensis octobris
anno quo supra

The said' day the ballieis assignit monunday that next cumis tile Niniane blinsele
one that ane part and tile Elizibetht leslie the Relict of vmquhile Dauid blinsele
on that vthir part to Comper befor thame for ministracioun' of Justice anent
the skath done to the landis quhilkis scho has in coniunctfeftment pertening to him
in heritage as ayr' to vmquhile the said' Dauid eftir the tenor of our Soueran
lordis lettres directit tharapone
Eodem die Johannes arthour Amerciatur in defectu presencie quia legttime citatus fuit et non comparuit
